BackRange_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0101>The rumors say that the bandit <clr:0000>Misko<clr:ffff> hid
legendary clothing in a nearby <clr:0000>cave<clr:ffff>.

<sp:3:0:2:0800>When I think I might get to see clothes
like that in person, my fashionista heart
starts beating like a drum!
But I have stay focused and find the <clr:0000>stone
statues<clr:ffff> that <clr:0000>mark the cave<clr:ffff>...
BackRange_02_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Near <clr:0000>Fort Hateno<clr:ffff>, there's a <clr:0000>cave marked
by stone statues<clr:ffff>. And in this cave rests
a piece of Misko's legendary clothing!
I swear on my wardrobe, I will find that
cave! You'll see!
BackRange_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0501>If I told you that I knew where to find
some of <clr:0000>Misko's fabled fashion items<clr:ffff>,
would you be interested?
<sp:3:0:2:0101>Ha! I thought as much. Well, listen up.


It's said that some of Misko's treasure
is near <clr:0000>Fort Hateno<clr:ffff>, hidden in a <clr:0000>cave
marked with stone statues<clr:ffff>.
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:Happy>Hateno Village, famous for the Cece
brand, is where I opened my eyes to the
wonders of fashion. It's serendipity!
I must find that cave. I will! On my honor
as a fashionista, I will get to the bottom
of this rumor!
GoRange_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01>Have you seen a <clr:0000>cave with stone statues
out front <clr:ffff>nearby? There's supposed to be
some of <clr:0000>Misko's treasure <clr:ffff>in there.
I've looked high and low, and still no luck.
In fact, I was just about ready to give up.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0800>But that's when I heard a rumor about
another one of Misko's treasures!<sp:0:4:0>They say that beyond <clr:0000>Hateno Village<clr:ffff>... <sp:5:0:0>
there's a cave running through <clr:0000>Walnot
Mountain<clr:ffff>! That must be where it's hidden.
So, change of plans—to <clr:0000>Hateno <clr:ffff>I go!
GoRange_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0801>The moment I met Cece at Hateno Village,
I was reborn as a fashionista.

That's why I must find whatever clothing
Misko hid in the <clr:0000>cave that runs through
Walnot Mountain<clr:ffff>. <sp:5:0:0>
So, I'll head to <clr:0000>Hateno Village <clr:ffff>and set out
from there.

<sp:3:0:2:0800>A bright future awaits me, I know it! <sp:5:1:0>I just
have to go out and grab it by the frills!
RainPoint_01_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>One of Misko's fabled fashion items is
hidden in a <clr:0000>cave nearby<clr:ffff>. <sp:5:0:0>I was going to go
searching, <sp:5:0:0>but the rain foiled my plans.
I can't risk soiling my clothes! I have a
reputation to consider.

<snd:Think_01>Still, I'll set out soon. <sp:5:0:0>I'd hate for
someone else to get there first...
Guardian00:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:Scare>Oh no... <sp:5:0:0>Look at that thing! <sp:5:1:0>Now this is
just not fair!
Near_GoalPoint_01: I'm close! I can feel it!
SavedLv3_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0401><snd:SurpriseS_01>Wow, the sight of you slaying that
monster... Scary. <sp:5:0:0>Cool, but scary.
GoRange_02_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><clr:0000>Misko<clr:ffff>'s fabled fashion items, hidden in a
<clr:0000>cave within Walnot Mountain<clr:ffff>... I have to
find them! I have to!
It's near <clr:0000>Hateno Village<clr:ffff>, so that's where
I'll go!
SavedLv3_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:Chat_00>Phew!<sp:5:0:0> How can I repay you?<sp:5:0:0> I don't think
a "thank you" will suffice.
ComStylishTalk_000a:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Greeting>We meet again! <sp:5:0:0>How have you been?<sp:5:1:0>
Worn anything good lately?
ComStylishTalk_000b:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:LaughS>Good evening! <sp:5:0:0>Isn't it just lovely out
tonight? Even the stars are strutting
their stuff!
StartPoint_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>I'm looking for the legendary <clr:0000>fashion
items<clr:ffff> the bandit <clr:0000>Misko<clr:ffff> left behind.

<sp:3:0:2:0a00>Rumor has it one of them is in a <clr:0000>cave
marked by stone statues<clr:ffff>, but I haven't
seen anything of the sort...
GoalPoint_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>I'm searching for a <clr:0000>cave that goes
through Walnot Mountain<clr:ffff>. It's said the
thief <clr:0000>Misko<clr:ffff> hid some clothes there.
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>I must be close, but... <sp:5:0:0>Where's the cave?
I don't see it...
SavedLv2_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>You rushed here just to rescue me?<sp:5:0:0>
I feel the tears coming on...
BackRange_01_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:TalkPositive>Do you know how to recognize the cave
where Misko's treasure is hidden?

Ding, ding! That's right! The stone statues
outside of it!
SavedLv1_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0a01><snd:Ease>Waaah!<sp:5:0:0> That was so scaaary!<sp:5:0:0> Th-thank
you for saving me...
Failed00:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>You tried to help me, didn't you?<sp:5:0:0> Well...
Thanks for making an effort.
SavedLv1_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:Ease>*sigh* <sp:5:0:0>That was close.


I'm a fashionista.<sp:5:0:0> My wheelhouse is
clothes, not combat.
Atacked00: <sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:Scare>Help! <sp:5:0:0>Please, help!<sp:5:0:0> I'll give you a reward!
StartPoint_01_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>They say the <clr:0000>bandit Misko's treasure<clr:ffff> is
hidden in a cave marked by stone statues.

But I'll confess, I'm starting to have
my doubts.

For I've searched high and low, and I can
find no such place...
StartPoint_01_3:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Still, I must not give up! A fashionista's
heart never falters!

I'll find one of those <clr:0000>legendary outfits<clr:ffff>.
No—two! And then the fashion world will
finally know my name!
GoalPoint_01_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>Some of <clr:0000>Misko's clothes<clr:ffff> are said to be in
a <clr:0000>cave going through Walnot Mountain<clr:ffff>.<sp:5:0:0>

It must be nearby, but...<sp:5:0:0>where?
RainPoint_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0801>Have you heard the rumors?<sp:5:0:0>


It's said the bandit <clr:0000>Misko<clr:ffff> stashed
fabulous fashions in secret locations.

Supposedly, one of them is in a
<clr:0000>cave nearby<clr:ffff>!

<sp:3:0:2:0a00>As a fashionista, I'd love to go find it,<sp:5:0:0>
but I can't risk getting this outfit wet...
FriendGreet_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:LaughS>My, my!<sp:5:0:0> We meet again. How goes your
journey? Wonderfully, I hope?

This is normally where I'd give you a
chance to respond, but I'd like to talk
about me instead.
<sp:3:0:2:0501>Once I was a woman without ambition. 
Sure, I had my twin loves of fashion and
travel, but I didn't have drive!
<sp:3:0:2:0800>But Cece's designs spoke to me.<sp:5:0:0> They
said, "Meeshy, take those fascinations
and turn them into action!"
Now I'm a changed woman, chasing the
treasures of another inspired fashionista—
the <clr:0000>Great Bandit<clr:ffff> <clr:0000>Misko<clr:ffff>!
And as I search for <clr:0000>Misko's collection<clr:ffff>,
I intend to spread the joy of fashion
everywhere I go. Such is my passion!
GoRange_01_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:LaughS>Rumor has it that Misko hid legendary
clothing in a <clr:0000>cave that runs through
Walnot Mountain<clr:ffff> near <clr:0000>Hateno Village<clr:ffff>.
I was originally trying to find a <clr:0000>cave<clr:ffff>
around here <clr:0000>marked by stone statues<clr:ffff>,
but I'm leaving those ambitions behind.
<snd:TalkPositive_00>Next stop, <clr:0000>Hateno Village<clr:ffff>!
